description: The file defines API endpoints for user authentication including registration, login, and retrieving current user info, using FastAPI framework. It includes route definitions, data models, and security-related functions.

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for token response containing access token and token type.

methods.name: Optional[User] _get_user_by_email(db: Session, email: str)
methods.description: Retrieve a User object from the database by email.

methods.name: User _get_current_user(db: Session, token: str)
methods.description: Retrieve the current authenticated user based on the provided token.

methods.name: UserSchema register(user_in: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user; creates user in database after hashing password.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate user and return a JWT token upon successful login.

methods.name: UserSchema me( db: Session = Depends(get_db), token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), )
methods.description: Endpoint to get the profile of the currently authenticated user.

ctags.name: UserSchema
ctags.pattern: /^from src.db.schemas import User as UserSchema, UserCreate$/

ctags.name: access_token
ctags.pattern: /^    access_token: str = Field(..., description="JWT access token")$/

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> To/

ctags.name: me
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), )

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(user_in: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> UserSchema:$/

ctags.name: token_type
ctags.pattern: /^    token_type: str = Field("bearer", description="Type of token")$/
